comments.body: Wouldn't it make more sense to execute these lines *before* running `pip install`?
Sure, changed. I just followed one of the recipes in the link posted by @bollwyvl. Made this change, resolving. ðŸ˜„

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@    - export CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS} -I${PREFIX}/include -I${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR}"
    - python setup.py build_ext --include-dirs=%PREFIX%\include --library-dirs=%PREFIX%\lib  # [win]
    - python setup.py build_ext --include-dirs=$PREFIX/include --library-dirs=$PREFIX/lib    # [not win]
    - "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vvv "
